name: B. Canvas Frames
statement:
Nicholas, a painter is going to paint several new canvases. Nicholas is
sure that the canvases will turn out so great that each one will need
framing and being hung on the wall. Frames are what Nicholas decided to
begin with. Nicholas has sticks whose lengths equal . Nicholas does not
want to break the sticks or glue them together. To make a -sized frame,
he needs two sticks whose lengths equal and two sticks whose lengths
equal . Specifically, to make a square frame (when ), he needs four
sticks of the same length.Now Nicholas wants to make from the sticks
that he has as many frames as possible; to be able to paint as many
canvases as possible to fill the frames. Help him in this uneasy task.
Note that it is not necessary to use all the sticks Nicholas has.
